column2: To update software packages, open the terminal and type 'sudo dnf upgrade' then press enter, input user password, and reboot.

column1: How to enable fractional scaling on Wayland?
column2: To enable fractional scaling on Wayland, open the terminal, run the command 'gsettings set org.gnome.mutter experimental-features "['scale-monitor-framebuffer']"', open Displays, and set 'Scale' to preference.

column1: How to enable tap-to-click on the touchpad?
column2: To enable tap-to-click on the touchpad, open the mouse settings, click the touchpad option at the top, and select 'Tap to Click' under 'Clicking'.

column1: How to open terminal in this system?
column2: To open terminal, browse to the horizontal line in the upper left corner, click to open it, and type out the word terminal, click to open it.

column1: What is the command for enabling tap-to-click?
column2: The command for enabling tap-to-click is 'gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.peripherals.touchpad tap-to-click true'.
